pullRequest.title: Enable aliases to show up for organizations and workflow versions in swagger output
pullRequest.bodyText:
When using the swagger UI and executing APIs that return workflows and their workflow versions enable the workflow version aliases to be seen in the return JSON
When using the swagger UI and executing APIs that return organizations enable the organization aliases to be seen in the return JSON

commit.message: enable aliases to show up for organizations and workflow versions
add tests for organization and collection aliases to be returned
add tests for workflow version alias in return from API call
only fetch workflow version aliases if specified in include parameter

nodes.bodyText: Do we want the include parameter here? Not many orgs, so maybe performance isn't an issue here.

commit.message: add aliases parameter to comment about include

nodes.bodyText:
Use a constant string for "aliases" and use it both here and in the (now badly named) initializeValidations method.
That way, someone won't accidentally rename one but not the other.
Should also do the same for validations while in the neighbourhood.

commit.message: make string constants for include strings
